DataElement.preferredName: Age Last CPT Eye Examination Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The participant's age when the last assessment of vision occured associated with a Current Procedural Terminology (CPT) code was assigned.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The participant's age when the last assessment of vision occured associated with a Current Procedural Terminology (CPT) code.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A period or stage in life, usually stated in years since birth.

Concepts.definition: How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.

Property.preferredName: Last Current Procedural Terminology Eye Examination
Property.preferredDefinition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:A proprietary medical nomenclature of the American Medical Association widely used to report medical procedures and services under public and private health insurance programs.:A test performed by an ophthalmologist or optometrist assessing vision and ability to focus on and discern objects, as well as other tests and examinations pertaining to the eyes.

Concepts.definition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A proprietary medical nomenclature of the American Medical Association widely used to report medical procedures and services under public and private health insurance programs.
A test performed by an ophthalmologist or optometrist assessing vision and ability to focus on and discern objects, as well as other tests and examinations pertaining to the eyes.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured, assigned or computed to describe an individual's age.
